```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
if (!require("particlesjs")) remotes::install_github("dreamRs/particlesjs")
particlesjs::particles(particles_config(
  particles.number.value = 40L,
  particles.number.density.enable = TRUE,
  particles.number.density.value_area = 800L,
  particles.color.value = "#5365D0",
  particles.shape.stroke.color = "#5365D0",
  particles.opacity.value = 0.8,
  particles.size.value = 3L,
  particles.size.anim.speed = 40L,
  particles.line_linked.enable = TRUE,
  particles.line_linked.distance = 150L,
  particles.line_linked.color = "#5365D0",
  particles.line_linked.opacity = 0.4,
  particles.line_linked.width = 1L,
  particles.move.enable = TRUE,
  particles.move.speed = 1L,
))
```
